content: on 3 25mm needles ears fold in half and sew the side edges onto the head row 1 knit row 2 kfb 2 times 4 sts fox row 3 knit body head & tail make up as per the raccoon row 4 k1 kfb 2 times k1 6 sts instructions row 5 knit ears sew the side edge onto the head row 6 k1 kfb k2 kfb k1 8 sts row 7 knit squirrel row 8 k1 k2tog k2 k2tog k1 6 sts body head & ears make up as per the raccoon instructions row 9 knit tail fold in half and sew the cast on edge and side row 10 k1 k2tog 2 times k1 4 sts edges decrease stuff and sew the cast off edge onto row 11 knit the bottom of the body row 12 k2tog 2 times 2 sts row 13 knit hedgehog row 14 k2tog 1 st body insert the toy safety eyes sew the side edges decrease and stuff this seam runs down the pull through to cast off underside gather the cast on sts decrease woodland tales mobile copyright © 2018 amanda berry page 9 of 10 toadstool stalk and cap for each piece sew the side edges decrease add stuffing leaving the cast on edge open sew the cast on edge of the cap onto the cast on edge of the stalk embroider the cap using white yarn and swiss darn duplicate stitch around the top acorn cup & nut sew the side edges decrease and stuff gather the cast on sts decrease to suspend the mobile using a 3 5mm crochet hook and beige yarn crochet a single chain 15cm long and bind off make 3 more identical chains wrap one end of each around the embroidery hoop and sew in place sew the other 4 ends together at the top and hang the mobile from this point to suspend the animals crochet single chains in beige yarn in 7cm to 10cm lengths sew one end of the chain onto the top of the toy and wrap the other end around the embroidery hoop and sew in place suspend the toadstool from the centre top for each leaf weave in the cast off tail and sew the cast on edge onto the beige crochet chain woodland tales mobile copyright © 2018 amanda berry page 10 of 10
